thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com | 2 of 33
thread.title: Richard Baines

author: Richard Baines
title: Richard Baines
text: I was skeptical that this type of experience would actually work, but decided to try it. I visited a dealer and looked at the car I was interested in and got a brochure, I went to the TrueCar web site and "built" the vehicle. Then I got the price guarantee certificate with a few dealer offers. I brought it in to the dealer and they immediately agreed to honor the price. No haggling or waiting while the salesman runs in and out of the managers office. I would definitely recommend this process.
